snippet.title: ONE BEAR ARMY - Official Game Reveal Trailer |  2.5D Action-Adventure Game | Free Demo on Steam
snippet.description:
🎮 Wishlist on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2646480/One_Bear_Army/

Take on the role of Bear, a veteran of the elite NAVY BEARS unit in ONE BEAR ARMY – 2.5D action-adventure game in which you will face the evil Professor Rat and his ruthless army.

Try the Free Demo and Early Access - available November 2024 on Steam!

Made in Godot 4.

🐦 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/P4_GAMES_
💬 Join our Discord community: https://discord.com/invite/aAwxqpWDg3
Official website: https://p4-games.com

#gametrailer #action  #actionadventure #actionadventuregames  #gaming #steam #godot  #indiegame #indiegames #earlyaccess
